events.message: Applicant John Doe has submitted his resume and cover letter for the software engineer position.
The application was reviewed and categorised under Engineering based on the keywords in the resume.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage the hiring process for this software developer candidate.
Initial phone screening completed; candidate demonstrated strong understanding of software development principles.
The candidate promptly responded with availability for the technical interview and expressed enthusiasm for the role.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10:00 AM to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview with strong coding performance and good problem-solving insights.
A competitive offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary, benefits, and start date options.
Candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and the company's culture, indicating strong interest.
Candidate formally accepted the offer and confirmed their commitment to join the engineering team.
Onboarding process initiated, including account setup, orientation scheduling, and introduction to the engineering team.
The hiring process has been successfully completed and the new software engineer is now fully onboarded.
